entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 15 April 2023
